headers.name: Subject
headers.value: URGENT: System Performance Issue - Immediate Review Needed

body.data: Hi Team, We're experiencing performance degradation in our production systems. Database query times have increased by 40% since this morning. Need immediate review of recent changes and resource allocation. Please join emergency call at 5:00 PM today. Critical systems affected: Customer portal, analytics dashboard, reporting pipeline. Escalation to management if not resolved by EOD. Thanks, Sarah Johnson, DevOps Lead
